item.description:
Hey Madams!!
Cafe Bar is a great place to relax in a chill atmosphere and have drinks after a long work week...:) And if you are up for more, the bar also provides great drinks, snacks, DJ, and board games. Is a really relaxed but a hip atmosphere.

So ladies, let's keep the momentum going for great meet up events, and have more Madams show up to this great event!!
Hope to see you Friday
P.S If you want to bring a game you are welcome too!!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be sitting at the big long couches to the right when you first walk in!!
item.name: Cafe Bar Friday night drinks & Game Night!!
